Name: Crea CafâˆšÂ©
Review Text: Great atmosphere, and great beers and snacks. The cheepest draft beer is 2,30 but if you're in the mood for IPA's or other "exotic" beers, they have plenty of these as well. However, prices are quite steep (5,00 for an alternative beer). â€¦

Name: Crea CafâˆšÂ©

Name: Crea CafâˆšÂ©
Review Text: Local University of Amsterdam watering hole.  Ordered some pemgen (spicy meatballs) and a Serrano ham sandwich with two pints of Grolsch.  Food was good and so was beer.  They take Visa and MasterCard.  We've discovered not all places in Amsterdam do.  Cozy atmosphere with some couches and small pub style tables.

Name: Crea CafâˆšÂ©
Review Text: Student run cafÃ©, always a great atmosphere, very busy! A reasonable selection of beers, and a good selection of simple, homey food for an excellent price.

Name: Crea CafâˆšÂ©
Review Text: Several times their unprofessional staff kept us waiting while others were served  who came later to the bar. I won't go there anymore. It's really a disappointment.
